entries.name: new(config={}, default=Config::HTTP)
entries.desc: Creates a new HTTP server according to config

entries.name: access_log(config, req, res)
entries.desc: Logs req and res in the access logs.  config is used for the server name.

entries.name: create_request(with_webrick_config)
entries.desc: Creates the HTTPRequest used when handling the HTTP request. Can be overridden by subclasses.

entries.name: create_response(with_webrick_config)
entries.desc: Creates the HTTPResponse used when handling the HTTP request. Can be overridden by subclasses.

entries.name: do_OPTIONS(req, res)
entries.desc: The default OPTIONS request handler says GET, HEAD, POST and OPTIONS requests are allowed.

entries.name: lookup_server(req)
entries.desc: Finds the appropriate virtual host to handle req

entries.name: mount(dir, servlet, *options)
entries.desc: Mounts servlet on dir passing options to the servlet at creation time

entries.name: mount_proc(dir, proc=nil, &block)
entries.desc: Mounts proc or block on dir and calls it with a WEBrick::HTTPRequest and WEBrick::HTTPResponse

entries.name: service(req, res)
entries.desc: Services req and fills in res

entries.name: virtual_host(server)
entries.desc: Adds server as a virtual host.
